roleset.name: call for noisily, demand

example.name: oh, those Italians
example.text: One of Italy 's favorite shows , `` Fantastico , '' a tepid variety show , is so popular that viewers clamored to buy a chocolate product , `` Cacao Fantastico , '' whose praises were sung each week by dancing showgirls -- even though the product did n't exist .

propbank.arg: to buy a chocolate product , `` Cacao Fantastico , '' whose praises were sung each week by dancing showgirls
even though the product did n't exist

roleset.note: CLAMOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clamor' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from clamor.01-v predicate notes)
